output_list.criticism: The `distributeToken` function does not contain any checks to prevent integer overflow. This can lead to unauthorized increases in the `balances[msg.sender]` of the sender, which can result in loss of funds.

The `distributeToken` function does not contain any checks to prevent bad randomness. This can lead to unauthorized increases in the `balances[msg.sender]` of the sender, which can result in loss of funds.

The `distributeToken` function does not contain any checks to prevent access control. This can lead to unauthorized increases in the `balances[msg.sender]` of the sender, which can result in loss of funds.

The `distributeToken` function does not contain any checks to prevent typos in the constructor. This can lead to unauthorized increases in the `balances[msg.sender]` of the sender, which can result in loss of funds.

The `distributeToken` function does not contain any checks to prevent token devalue. This can lead to unauthorized increases in the `balances[msg.sender]` of the sender, which can result in loss of funds.
